Text:
please seed! I've been downloading this thing at under 5k/s and I can download other stuff at 600k/s
seed please

Thank you webchella! This video has English and Spanish subtitles as well as the english commentaries. 
I found out that even though Windows media player plays the video, it doesn't recognize the different audio and subtitles that are available. You need to use a different video player to change the audio or subtitles. I use VLC Player.
Thank you again!
